Articles.Content: Docking ports couple fine, but when they decouple the game thinks that my craft has crashed. When I view the craft again the docking ports have no option to decouple. Further, the docking ports do not function like a decoupler, as they did in the first game, and cannot decouple from non-docking port parts (in addition to docking ports).
This happens to me too - I cannot complete a mun landing with an apollo style craft

also had my ship explode on vessel switch. that was fun.

 

i think docking was on the known broken list. 

Edited February 28, 2023 by Nuke
